House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00089
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING MEDICAL ALLOWANCE FOR PUBLIC SCHOOL TEACHERS
ABSTRACT : Grants a medical allowance of two thousand pesos (P2,000.00) per month to public school teachers and basic and higher education nationwide, including those who are teaching in the alternative learning system of the Department of Education.
